name: Projecto Ada-01
description:
(ES)

En un laboratorio abandonado, una robot despierta de su largo sueño con la memoria dañada. Lo único que sabe es que desea encontrar a su dueña y, para ello, deberá huir, superando los puzzles que encuentra. ¿Serás capaz de encontrar la salida?

(EN. Game in spanish)

In an abandoned laboratory, a robot wakes up from a deep sleep with damaged memory. The only thing she knows is that she wants to find her owner and, to do so, she'll have to flee, solving the puzzle she finds. Will you be able to find the way out?

Student project (2021) made in a 3 months span. 

We are Team NextEvo, a group of 3 gamedev students:

-Irene Vivancos: Game Producer, Lead Programmer, 2D and UI Artist.

-Juan Francisco Sánchez: Level Designer, Game Designer.

-Jonathan Sánchez: 3D Modeller, Texture Artist.
